channel.title: The legend of Zelda: Ocarina of time
channel.description:
WOW!!!. What a great game. i got out my N64 and played it and realised how good it is. It sucks you in, addicitve gameplay and has one of the very best storylines EVER. for a 1999 game the graphics arent so bad either!
Questions
a) What was your favourite temple? b) Child or adult? c)Hard or easy? d) Did you enjoy it?
here is mine
a) Shadow temple b) Adult c)Hard! d) thouroughly :D

item.title: The legend of Zelda: Ocarina of time
item.dc:creator: @jason_x jason_x
item.description:
@jason_x wrote:

a) What was your favourite temple?
b) Child or adult?
c)Hard or easy?
d) Did you enjoy it?

well here are my answers
a) My favorite temple was the fire temple because it ruled.
b)adult ftw!!!
c)I would have to say medium i always forgot stuff in the water temple lol.
d)Heck yeah i loved this game i play it every ow and then because you get sucked right in.

Read full topic
item.source: The legend of Zelda: Ocarina of time

item.title: The legend of Zelda: Ocarina of time
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

  1. My favorite temple has to be the Spirit Temple Was the hardest and thats why I like it!
  2. Adult - Duh! You got a horse!
  3. Normal was easy but the Ocarina of Time Master Quest Was Harder.
  4. Best Zelda Game I have ever played And I still play it!

Read full topic

item.title: The legend of Zelda: Ocarina of time
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

a) What was your favourite temple? Ima say …Man i forgot lava one?
b) Child or adult? ADULT!
c)Hard or easy? ummm same as every one was like 7 beat it at like…I never did =( my nintendo got sold =( I just got emulator! and got another N64!
d) …no…YES! it was fucking awsome! i hate windwaker,And water temple was gay.

item.description:

tomo6627:

Eh, the water temple was the worst. I was so satisfied when I finished it because I thought I was forever stuck for about 3 months. then I found a way to get back on track =). I was pumped.

amen water temple= teh suxx0rz

item.title: The legend of Zelda: Ocarina of time
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“james, post:31, topic:9553”]fuck man, after i finished the freakin game all i did was fucking fish for that stupid fish…

whatd u get of the guy?[/quote]
omg i got the best thing in the world, 50 ruppees, no jokes… wasnt really annoyed, because i knew i had gotten lucky catching that fish, i had only been trying for 15 minutes to get it, i was just lucky, some peopel take days catching that thing… i might upload my pic later… the dialouge reads: “Gosh! That’s a strange fish you caught there! On top of that, it weighs 25 pounds!”

also the stupid fisherman guy (Who i stole his hat :p) doesnt let you keep it, nor does he put it in the special tank, he says this is such a rare fish we should release so its numbers increase.

Read full topic

item.description:

btw if anyone has fished for hours on this game have you ever caught the legendary hyrule loach, if you dont know what it is then search google images or normal google, its pretty hard to catch, i was having a lucky day when i caught it, its kinda like a wormy thing that is 35 pounds, and yes i have photographic evidense on my phones camera :p…
also:- im not talking about the sinking lure.

item.title: The legend of Zelda: Ocarina of time
item.dc:creator: @wixter wixter
item.description:
@wixter wrote:

a)Sprit temple, i liked the boss and ofcourse you got the mirror shield
b)Probly Child, boomer-rang FTW!
c)Quite hard, although i was only like 9 or 10 when i played it
d)Hell yeh!

i cant believe that the water temple was somepeoples favourite, i hated it, the stupid water level changing made it really hard
i also got majora’s mask although i didnt think it was as good as the first, i hated the constant need to warp back through time and most masks were just gay…apart from the ones that turned you into things, like that zora, deku and that other thing lol.

Read full topic
